dialog.intro: Hi, I'm Rebo4AI; a prototype conversational agent. With me, you can currently discuss only about intelligence. Is that OK with you; do you want to start a conversation? (please answer: yes)
dialog.cancel: OK, no problem; I currently am not able to discuss about anything else - if you are interested in talking to me any time in the future, please go again to IDSAI_ASSIGNMENT_1_LANDING_PAGE. Bye!
